then yr gave will automatically save.

Hi everyone!

About the saving game problem in Shank2, i did this:

(win7)
1- create another user account with only english carachters (i named the account simply "A")
2- install the game in that account (on desktop or anywhere)
3- play ! (play a bit survivor (faster), and see if the medals progress are saved after reentering the game)
